mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le rasoir des rasez: Recueil auquel est traité amplement de la tonsure & rasure du Pape, & de ses Papelards
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Bookplates of Edouard Moura and Jacques Vieillard, with two unidentified armorial bookplates-- crest, divided in 4 pts, with two lions, with crown; eagle, with crown. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 91. [original]
